channel.title: Julia for VSCode
channel.description: Recent content on Julia for VSCode

item.title: Julia for VSCode is a powerful, free IDE for the Julia language.
item.description: Read more about it below or get going straight away.

item.title: Walks like Python. Runs like C.
item.description: We build on Julia’s unique combination of ease-of-use and performance. Beginners and experts can build better software more quickly, and get to a result faster.

item.title: Useable real-time feedback.
item.description: With a completely live environment, Julia for VSCode aims to take the frustration and guesswork out of programming and put the fun back in. A hybrid “canvas programming” style combines the exploratory power of a notebook with the productivity and static analysis features of an IDE.

item.title: Great for power users, too.
item.description: Visual Studio Code is a powerful editor and customisable to your heart’s content (though the defaults are pretty good too). It has power features like multiple cursors, fuzzy file finding and Vim keybindings.
